啟.definition: to open; to start; to initiate; to enlighten or awaken; to state; to inform

啟事.definition: announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website); to post information; a notice

啟動.definition: to start (a machine); (fig.) to set in motion; to launch (an operation); to activate (a plan)

啟奏.definition: to submit a report to the king; to talk to the king

啟封.definition: to open sth that has been sealed

啟德機場.definition: Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998

啟明.definition: Classical Chinese name for planet Venus in the east before dawn

啟東.definition: Qidong, county-level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu

啟東市.definition: Qidong, county-level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu

啟海話.definition: Qihai dialect, a Wu dialect spoken in Tongzhou, Haimen, and Qidong districts in southern Jiangsu province, and on Chongming Island in Shanghai

啟用.definition: to start using; (computing) to enable (a feature)

啟發.definition: to enlighten; to explain (a text etc); to stimulate (a mental attitude); enlightenment; revelation; motivation

啟矇.definition: variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]; to instruct the young

啟示.definition: to reveal; to enlighten; enlightenment; revelation; illumination; moral (of a story etc); lesson

啟示錄.definition: the Revelation of St John the divine; the Apocalypse

啟程.definition: to set out on a journey

啟航.definition: (of a ship) to set sail; (of an airplane) to take off

啟蒙.definition: to instruct the young; to initiate; to awake sb from ignorance; to free sb from prejudice or superstition; primer; enlightened; the Enlightenment; Western learning from the late Qing dynasty

啟蟄.definition: Waking from Hibernation; old variant of 驚蟄|惊蛰[Jing1 zhe2], Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 6th-20th March

啟齒.definition: to open one's mouth; to start talking
